Posts.Content: May 22, 2015 04:35PM Ssill wrote: thanks for your encouragement. I really hope that results come back today- but as it gets later and later in the day I am losing hope. Is it normal for results to take longer then what the radiologist estimated?
Posts.Title: So scared Ssill MelissaDallas

Posts.Content: Ssill wrote: I am 31 years old and have been having pain in my left breast for about a month. I went in for a mammogram and ultrasound on Monday. They found a mass and a swollen lymph node they wanted to biospy ( Birad 4a ) I went in later that day for the biospsy. The mass ended up just being a fluid filled cyst- which was great!! Then they took what felt like 100 biopsys of my lymph node, core and needle. I am still waiting for the results and I feel like I am going crazy. I can't stop worrying and crying. I have an almost 2 year old and can't keep but thinking- what if.. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: So scared Ssill MelissaDallas

Posts.Content: May 23, 2015 09:17PM Ssill wrote: so... Didn't hear Friday. They said they are backed up in pathology and my case has not been reviewed yet. What does that mean? That they have not tested anything yet or something different? I am freaking out here.
Posts.Title: So scared Ssill MelissaDallas

Posts.Content: May 22, 2015 12:32PM - edited May 22, 2015 12:37PM by Ssill Thank you for your support. This waiting is just so horrible. My biopsy was taken Monday afternoon. The radiologist said I should have the results in 2-3 days,  Today is day 4. I have been in contact with my GP and he said that they have not reviewed my case yet. I keep thinking- is that because they found something, had to run more tests and that was the delay in getting the report to the Pathologist to review.... The fact that it is a Lymph Node in question is FREAKING me out.
Posts.Title: So scared Ssill MelissaDallas

Posts.Content: May 26, 2015 07:09PM - edited May 26, 2015 07:11PM by Ssill I got my results back today and they are Benign!!! I just wanted to thank everyone for all the support over the last week. You are amazing.
